about_me_paragraph_1: I have been dedicated to software development since 2022, and since 2023, I have been working professionally as a full-stack developer, focusing on Internet of Things (IoT) solutions. My main stack includes React, TypeScript, Next.js, and Node.js.
about_me_paragraph_2: My journey began with studies in frontend development, which quickly led me to a position as a Junior Developer. In pursuit of continuous learning, I expanded my knowledge to full-stack application development. I am also experienced with IoT, Ubidots, MQTT, Figma, Tailwind, Sass, and more. I have a particular interest in transforming ideas and business rules into real solutions, applying clean architecture, Domain-Driven Design (DDD), and the Ports and Adapters pattern.
about_me_paragraph_3: In addition to being a developer, I am a musician, teacher, and have experience in digital marketing. You might also want to check out my YouTube channel.
next_js_description: Next.js is a React framework that provides hybrid rendering (SSR and SSG), static page generation, simplified routing, integrated API, and performance optimization. It's ideal for building fast, scalable web applications with a focus on SEO, combining efficiency and flexibility in development.
react_js_description: JavaScript library for building reactive, scalable user interfaces with a focus on reusable components.
typescript_description: A superset of JavaScript that adds static typing, improving safety and productivity in development.
node_js_description: JavaScript runtime for backend development, enabling scalable, high-performance applications with an event-driven focus.
tailwind_css_description: Utility-first CSS framework that simplifies interface design with ready-to-use and customizable classes.
styled_components_description: Styling library for React and React Native that uses CSS-in-JS, combining styles with components.
sass_description: CSS preprocessor offering advanced features like variables, mixins, and rule nesting.
postgresql_description: Advanced relational database, highly scalable and reliable, with support for extensions and complex transactions.
ubidots_description: IoT platform for real-time data monitoring and visualization, simplifying connected device management.
html_css_js_description: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript form the foundation of web development. HTML structures content, CSS defines style and layout, and JavaScript adds interactivity, creating dynamic and engaging user experiences.
experience_sagil: Sagil is a native IoT (Internet of Things) technology brand created as part of the innovation program at Gnatus, a leader in the dental market. The company focuses on monitoring and ensuring the safety of temperature-sensitive products in the dental, hospital, pharmaceutical, and veterinary sectors. I participated in the development of the solution from the ground up, contributing to every stageâ€”from data collection through sensors to the development of the final platform.
project_portfolio__description: Designed to serve as a showcase of my journey, skills, and professional achievements through a simple and elegant interface.
